title: Police Seek Identity of Suspects Wanted for Armed Robbery of McDonald's in Oxon Hill
body:
The Prince George’s County Police Department is working to identify the suspects shown in the above surveillance photographs. On January 11, 2012, at approximately 8:49 p.m., the suspects committed an armed robbery at the McDonald’s located at 5500 St. Barnabas Road in Oxon Hill, Maryland.Anyone with information that may assist in this investigation is asked to call CRIME SOLVERS at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477) or CID-Robbery Unit at 301-772-4905 as soon as possible. Please refer to case number 12-011-2767. Whenever information is given to the Prince George’s County Crime Solvers Line, you do not have to leave your name. A CASH REWARD OF UP TO $1000.00 is being offered for the tip that leads to the arrest and indictment of the suspects responsible for this robbery.
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
